isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - OPERATION - ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD WIPERS (COWL MOUNTED) WITH WING PANEL MOUNTED SWITCHES

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD WIPERS (COWL MOUNTED) WITH WING PANEL MOUNTED SWITCHES
svcproc.para: The electric wiper/washer switches for the 5000 and 9000 models (after June 1994) are located on the wing panel of the instrument panel to the right of the driver.
Use the wiper speed control rocker switch to start and stop the wiper-only function and to control wiper speed, HIGH or LOW.
Use the intermittent operation/washer control sliding (rheostat) switch to control intermittent wiper operation, and to operate the windshield washer.
